# Shelegs
Sheleg are a race of ice-like humanoid beings, with strong Nordic culture, posses blue skin and white hair.
## Diet - Normal medical chemicals has no effects, however cryo chemicals works with thier cold body temperature.
## Benefits - [color=#1e90ff]Takes no Cold damage and 20% less Blunt, Slash and Piercing damage.[/color] - [color=#1e90ff]Due to their big size, they can easily carry, shove and pull any other morphotypes.[/color] - [color=#1e90ff]They are harder to shove.[/color] - Being cold has no walking and running speed reductions. - As long as they are alive, they slowly passively heal heat damage.
## Special - [color=#ffa500]They have a -172 degrees celsius body temperature. They must wear an EVA suit and always start the shift provided with one.[/color] - Cryoxadone blood - Inhale oxygen and exhale water vapor. - Get hungry slower, but thirsty faster. - Have no floor friction with no shoes. - bare-hand attack for [color=red]3 Blunt[/color] and [color=red]2 Cold.[/color]
## Drawbacks - They are harder to carry and pull. - [color=#ffa500]They are bigger than Humans, making them easier to hit.[/color] - [color=#ffa500]Takes 65% more Heat and 25% more Shock damage.[/color] - [color=#ffa500]They take high heat damage above 0 degrees celsius body temperature.[/color] - Cannot be syringed, hypo or darted due to their hardened skin. - Slow food and chemical mobilization, can only processes one chemical at a time. - Violent reaction to potassium. Touching it hurts, and drinking it melts them.
